mapper.select: select * from f_folder where p_no = #{p_no} and folder_path like #{folder_path}||'%/' and folder_path not like #{folder_path}||'%/_%'
mapper.update: update f_folder set folder_path = substr(folder_path, 0, instr(#{old_path},'/',-1,2)) || #{name} ||substr(folder_path, instr(#{old_path},'/',-1,1)) where folder_path like #{old_path} || '%'
mapper.delete: delete from f_folder where p_no = #{p_no} and folder_path like #{folder_path}||'%'
mapper.update: update f_folder set folder_path = #{destination_folder_path} || substr(folder_path, instr(#{folder_to_move},'/',-1,2)+1) where folder_num in( select folder_num from f_folder where p_no = #{p_no} and folder_path like #{folder_to_move}||'%' )
